QuestData.Title: The Strength of Our Bonds
QuestData.Description: Asha has passed, but we share a bond that cannot be severed by death. Even now, her spirit urges me onward to Grom'gar.$B$BThe Iron Wolf claims our attachments make us weak... that love makes us vulnerable.$B$BHe is wrong.$B$BKarg is my strength, and I his. I will free him from his chains, and together we will show the Thunderlord clan the strength of our bonds.
QuestData.RewardText: Help me out of these chains. We have work to do.
